001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
007import java.util.Objects;
008
009import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
010
011import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
012import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
013import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
014import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
015
016/**
017 * Finds templates based on the model type (class).
018 * <p>
019 * The default {@link JStachio} uses a combination of relection and the ServiceLoader to
020 * find templates.
021 * <p>
022 * Other implementations may want to use their DI framework like Spring or CDI to find
023 * templates.
024 *
025 * @author agentgt
026 *
027 */
028public non-sealed interface JStachioTemplateFinder extends JStachioExtension {
029
030        /**
031         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise possibly falling back to a
032         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata or some other mechanism.
033         *
034         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
035         * template was returned instead of the fallback {@link TemplateInfo} metadata.
036         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
037         * not the Templates class</em>)
038         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
039         * template was found.
040         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
041         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
042         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
043         */
044        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception;
045
046        /**
047         * Finds a template or null if no template is found. Should not throw an exception if
048         * a template is not found.
049         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
050         * not the Templates class</em>)
051         * @return <code>null</code> if the template is was not found or the template info
052         * which might be a {@link Template} if the generated template was found.
053         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
054         * @see #findTemplate(Class)
055         */
056        default @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
057                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
058                try {
059                        return findTemplate(modelType);
060                }
061                catch (Exception e) {
062                        return null;
063                }
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * Determines if this template finder has a template for the model type (the class
068         * annotated by JStache).
069         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
070         * not the Templates class</em>)
071         * @return true if this finder has template for modelType
072         * @throws NullPointerException if the modelType is null
073         */
074        default boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
075                var t = findOrNull(modelType);
076                if (t == null) {
077                        return false;
078                }
079                return true;
080        }
081
082        /**
083         * Hint on order of template finders. The found {@link JStachioTemplateFinder}s are
084         * sorted naturally (lower number comes first) based on the returned number. Thus a
085         * template finder with a lower order number that {@link #supportsType(Class)} the
086         * model class will be used.
087         * @return default returns zero
088         */
089        default int order() {
090                return 0;
091        }
092
093        /**
094         * The default template finder that uses reflection and or the ServiceLoader.
095         * <p>
096         * <em>This implementation performs no caching. If you would like caching call
097         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)} on the returned finder.</em>
098         * @param config used to help find templates as well as logging.
099         * @return default template finder.
100         */
101        public static JStachioTemplateFinder defaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
102                return new DefaultTemplateFinder(config);
103        }
104
105        /**
106         * Decorates a template finder with a cache using {@link ClassValue} with the
107         * modelType as the key.
108         * <p>
109         * <em>While the finder does not provide any eviction the cache will not prevent
110         * garbage collection of the model classes.</em>
111         * @param finder to be decorated unless the finder is already decorated thus it is a
112         * noop to repeateadly call this method on already cached template finder.
113         * @return caching template finder
114         */
115        public static JStachioTemplateFinder cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder finder) {
116                if (finder instanceof ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder) {
117                        return finder;
118                }
119                return new ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(finder);
120        }
121
122        /**
123         * Creates a template finder from an iterable of templates. The returned finder will
124         * just loop through the templates and call {@link TemplateInfo#supportsType(Class)}.
125         * To avoid the looping cost wrap the return with
126         * {@link #cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder)}.
127         * @param templates templates to be searched in order of the iterable
128         * @param order order hint see {@link #order()}.
129         * @return adapted template finder
130         */
131        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
132                return new IterableTemplateFinder(templates, order);
133        }
134
135}
136
137final class DefaultTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
138
139        private final JStachioConfig config;
140
141        DefaultTemplateFinder(JStachioConfig config) {
142                super();
143                this.config = config;
144        }
145
146        @Override
147        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
148                return Templates.findTemplate(modelType, config);
149        }
150
151        @Override
152        public int order() {
153                return Integer.MAX_VALUE;
154        }
155
156}
157
158class TemplateNotFoundException extends NoSuchElementException {
159
160        private static final long serialVersionUID = -4016359589653582060L;
161
162        private final Class<?> modelType;
163
164        protected TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType, @Nullable String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
165                super(message, cause);
166                this.modelType = modelType;
167        }
168
169        public TemplateNotFoundException(Class<?> modelType) {
170                this(modelType, errorMessage(modelType), (Throwable) null);
171        }
172
173        protected static String errorMessage(Class<?> modelType) {
174                return "template not found for type: " + modelType;
175        }
176
177        public Class<?> modelType() {
178                return modelType;
179        }
180
181}
182
183abstract class AbstractTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
184
185        private final int order;
186
187        protected AbstractTemplateFinder(int order) {
188                super();
189                this.order = order;
190        }
191
192        @Override
193        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
194                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
195                var t = findOrNull(modelType);
196                if (t == null) {
197                        throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
198                }
199                return t;
200        }
201
202        @Override
203        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
204                Objects.requireNonNull(modelType, "modelType");
205                var t = findOrNull(modelType);
206                if (t == null) {
207                        return false;
208                }
209                return true;
210        }
211
212        @Override
213        public int order() {
214                return this.order;
215        }
216
217}
218
219final class IterableTemplateFinder extends AbstractTemplateFinder {
220
221        private final Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates;
222
223        public IterableTemplateFinder(Iterable<? extends TemplateInfo> templates, int order) {
224                super(order);
225                this.templates = templates;
226        }
227
228        @Override
229        public @Nullable TemplateInfo findOrNull(Class<?> modelType) {
230                for (var t : templates) {
231                        if (t.supportsType(modelType)) {
232                                return t;
233                        }
234                }
235                return null;
236        }
237
238}
239
240final class ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
241
242        private final ClassValue<TemplateInfo> cache;
243
244        private final JStachioTemplateFinder delegate;
245
246        public ClassValueCacheTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder delegate) {
247                super();
248                this.delegate = delegate;
249                this.cache = new ClassValue<TemplateInfo>() {
250
251                        @Override
252                        protected @Nullable TemplateInfo computeValue(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
253                                try {
254                                        return delegate.findTemplate(type);
255                                }
256                                catch (Exception e) {
257                                        Templates.sneakyThrow(e);
258                                        throw new RuntimeException();
259                                }
260                        }
261                };
262        }
263
264        @Override
265        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
266                return cache.get(modelType);
267        }
268
269        @Override
270        public int order() {
271                return delegate.order();
272        }
273
274}
275
276final class CompositeTemplateFinder implements JStachioTemplateFinder {
277
278        private final List<JStachioTemplateFinder> finders;
279
280        private CompositeTemplateFinder(List<JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
281                super();
282                this.finders = finders;
283        }
284
285        public static JStachioTemplateFinder of(List<? extends JStachioTemplateFinder> finders) {
286                if (finders.size() == 1) {
287                        return finders.get(0);
288                }
289                ArrayList<JStachioTemplateFinder> sorted = new ArrayList<>();
290                sorted.addAll(finders);
291                sorted.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(JStachioTemplateFinder::order));
292                return new CompositeTemplateFinder(List.copyOf(sorted));
293        }
294
295        @Override
296        public TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
297                for (var f : finders) {
298                        var t = f.findOrNull(modelType);
299                        if (t != null) {
300                                return t;
301                        }
302                }
303                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
304        }
305
306}
